name: Provisions on the Administration of Algorithmic Recommendation for Internet Information Services
use_case: Regulates recommendation algorithms used in internet information services, focusing on user rights, security, and content governance.
data_summary: Requires transparency on algorithm mechanics, data usage limitations, and protections against discriminatory or addictive outcomes.
monitoring: Mandates algorithm security assessments and oversight by provincial CAC offices.
emergency_plan: Requires mechanisms to rapidly address unlawful content dissemination and system failures.
obligations: Filing algorithm recommendation services with CAC for platforms with public opinions impacts or social mobilization capability.
Provide users with options to disable personalized recommendations and protect minors.
Prevent illegal content amplification and adopt fairness, transparency, and security safeguards.
penalties: May include warnings, rectification orders, service suspension, and fines per Cybersecurity Law.
